import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logout } from '../store/auth'; import { language } from '../utils/utils'; function Navbar() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { user } = useSelector(state => state.auth); const [userInfos, setUserInfos] = useState({}) const SignOut = async () => { dispatch(logout()); localStorage.removeItem('userData') } useEffect(() => { setUserInfos(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userData'))); }, [localStorage.getItem('userData')]); return (
